argument.description: The string to convert to lowercase.

description: The PostgreSQL lower function converts all characters in the specified string to lowercase.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT lower('Tech on the Net');
      lower
-----------------
tech on the net
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT lower('TechOnTheNet.com is #1');
         lower
------------------------
 techonthenet.com is #1
(1 row)
